title: Garen is disgustingly broken right now
body:
0 Damage Items.
More damage than anyone in the game
and tankyer than all champs put together

replies.body: Well his ult is the one that's OP. It took 747 true damage out of me when i was playing as Veigar in ARAM Yesterday.

Meaning you probably only had like 500 health, because it's based on missing health.

175 / 350 / 525 (+ 28.6 / 33.3 / 40% of target's missing health)

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FB7Go1BZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-25T10:24:58.701+0000)
>
> Meaning you probably only had like 500 health, because it's based on missing health.
> 
> 175 / 350 / 525 (+ 28.6 / 33.3 / 40% of target's missing health)

No no no he dealt true damage to me which means i am the Villain when he ulted me

And?

That's what you get for being the villain.

Nobody likes a villain.

"0 damage items"

Has **black cleaver, Youmuu's,** Dead man's plate, Thornmail and Randuin's.

And it's funny because you just made a thread saying that you deserve to be higher, but;

a) don't know what damage items are
b) don't build last whisper when your team is all AD (hint Last Whisper should have been the item you bought instead of IE.)
c) built an IE on twitch into Randuin's (and it looks like your going PD next)
d) Never upgraded your trinket, and only ever bought 1 ward
EDIT: and E) lost a 4v5
Play Singed. You don't have to care at all about who wins or loses the game. Just about how many enemies you can fuck over with your troll trail.

You know even with his kit as powerful as it is, I thank the lord everyday that Sunfire garen no longer exists

{{champion:86}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3009}}

He is in a very strong place i think. 

Hard to beat. Like a boiled egg.

um have none of you seen the new mord his q dose 1k damage with just 180 ad or 200 ap its so op or skarner you build 2 damage items and just gank get drag and counter jg he has 100 attack speed to the normal 60 to 70 attack speed of a norm champ late game he has 2.50 attack speed after getting a {{item:3153}}  and a{{item:3931}} not to menshin the 4k to 5k hp mords the worst go ad crit do 1k ad hits with 1k ap q and a shield get {{item:3031}} and {{item:3046}} then go full tank see how op that is garens probs the least op of them all well there is darius
